channel.title: NMS:BKR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:BKR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Baker Hughes Inks 2025’s Largest Bridge Loan for Chart Purchase
item.description: Baker Hughes Co. has lined up the biggest blue-chip debt financing for an acquisition this year after cinching a $9.6 billion deal to buy Chart Industries Inc.
